about_the_game:
Cuckoo Mask is a thrilling and engaging visual novel game that explores the dynamics of relationships, fetish, and cheating. The game follows the story of a main character who gets bullied in a... fun and sexy way! Making it perfect for masochistic players or those who enjoy reading about humiliation.

The game begins with the main character missing the last train of the day and feeling lost, but he stumbles upon a masked party where he sees a girl who looks like his girlfriend. Everyone at the party wears a mask, and the owner of the house is nowhere to be seen. The main character soon discovers that no one he meets is inclined to treat him well, but... he finds himself enjoying the mistreatment.

As the game progresses, players can freely explore the house and talk to anyone, or examine the room. Time passes as the player progresses through a character's route, with dialogues changing every hour to create the feeling of a real party. To reach the climax of a character's route, players must find them in the crowd and talk to them, just like at a party.



LOTS OF ART
Cuckoo Mask is a visual novel game that focuses on the art of storytelling through appealing illustrations. The game features a lot of art from the talented artist Hassel_Nut, who has created an array of lewd, charming scenes throughout the game. Players will be able to experience the story through a naughty lens, as the art brings each scene to life in a unique, indecent way. Hassel Nut's art is a standout feature of the game, showcasing the artist's skill and love for lewdness. Whether you're a fan of visual novels or just appreciate erotic art, Cuckoo Mask is a game that is sure to impress.

ROSTER OF FUNNY AND HANDSOME CHARACTERS
The game features a number of different characters with their own sex scenes and kinks, allowing players to explore different aspects of the being dominated and, or, humiliated. Secondary characters also play an important role in the game, as they contribute to the flow of the story. Each character has their own unique personality, they also love to bully you and steal your girlfriends. So if you enjoy that, or if you enjoy a large character roster handling a situation out of the norm, make sure to check it out.

NO SEX?
The game features this little and perky aspect wher the main character will NOT have any sexual encounter, even though other characters do. This adds an interesting layer to the story, as players will experience the meaning of being a loser. This allows players to focus more on the voyeur aspect of the game, and how even the characters that are attracted to you will not even youch you. It is a diffeferent approach to the traditional eroge gamesand it makes Cuckoo Mask stand out. It's a game that players who are looking for a unique and intriguing story that doesn't rely on actually being stepped on.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features sexual acts between consenting adults. The sexual content features themes such as NTR (Cheating), Swinging (Partner Swapping), and BDSM.

  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics

short_description: A EROGE VISUAL NOVEL game visual novel by smut artist Hasselnut- in Cuckoo Mask you're the biggest bulliable bottom in a masked party! With 5 character routes and one true ending, you will explore different kinds of domination.
